channel.title: Blogs on Antonio Nardone - Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Antonio Nardone - Blog

item.description: Realtime app using Vue and Feathersjs A very simple and fast way to build a realtime app using Vue and Feathersjs What is feathersjs? Feathersjs is “a REST and real-time API layer for Node.js” quoting from the intro, with 10,546 stars on Github. Another nodejs framework? Yes. Why feathersjs? Because based on the micro-service concept is really fast to learn and understand. Even if you don’t know much about nodejs and express it makes things simple.
